TopicTitle: [NEED Built] (HARD mode career), Very early stages

Articles.Content:

I donÃ‚Â´t have any crafts right now. However I would suggest to take the reputation -> science strategie on 25-50%. It helped me very much during my career, and youÃ‚Â´ll need your funds in 0.90 more than before.
OK Figured it out. Cheapest rocket i could build that gets to low kerbin orbit with plenty of fuel for "mistakes" and retrograde burn to fall back to earth safely.
